article: We were moving to a new state after my husband had been out of work for many months and we had no money. In fact ,we had to borrow money to reach our destination town.Anyway, it was my husband,two boys _ four and two,and myself seven months pregnant,in an old Volvo station wagon.  We had been _ for two days in the middle of winter,and we had taken a route that was very _ .There was nothing around for miles-no cars,buildings or _ of civilization.Suddenly,our car started _ power.  We saw a light in the distance and managed to roll to a _ in front of this property that looked _ a small simple house.Our cell phones had not gotten reception for many miles, and it was _ outside,so I didn't know if we were going to make _ out of this situation alive.  My husband got out of the car to see _ there was something he could do to get us _ again,but it was not looking good.A short while later,a man came out of the house and spoke with my husband a bit before _ us all into his home.He and his wife took us in,fed us,and made us _ at home as we struggledtofind some _ to get to our destination,which was still a few hours'drive _ .We were able to call a friend and get a ride, _ our broken car behind,but not before the couple gave us food and water for our _ .  One week later,this dear sweet couple _ our car all the way to our place and refused to take _ in return,except for us to pay it forward...and we will continue to do it forever.
